content.raw: I did a few tests and if I set refraction to `0`, the water doesn’t look transparent anymore and I don’t see the propeller under the water. If I increment the refraction value, I start seeing the propeller. Not sure if I notice any effect in the reflected image while changing the refraction. Is this expected? My naive intuition about refraction was expecting a reflected distortion proportional to the refraction value.
content.html: I did a few tests and if I set refraction to 0, the water doesn’t look transparent anymore and I don’t see the propeller under the water. If I increment the refraction value, I start seeing the propeller. Not sure if I notice any effect in the reflected image while changing the refraction. Is this expected? My naive intuition about refraction was expecting a reflected distortion proportional to the refraction value.
